Key Match Events: Hong Kong scored 152/5 in their 20 overs
Post-Match Reflections: Suryakumar Yadav was named Player of the Match
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at Dubai International Cricket Stadium
India won 2 points and Hong Kong 0 points
Others: The match was a part of the Men's T20 Asia Cup 2022
The match was played on August 31, 2022
